page.title: 19TOYS AND GAMES
page.content: TODAYS MODERN TOYS ARE THINGS BOTH LARGE AND SMALL. THE BOYS LIKE SCALEXTRIC RACING TRACKS, B.M.X. BICYCLES ,RADIO CONTROLLED TOYS BIG TRACK AND ACTION MAN. SOME OF THE GIRLS FAVOURITES ARE MY LITTLE PONY, SINDY, BARBIE AND RAINBOW BRIGHT. BOTH BOYS AND GIRLS LIKE T.V. LEGO AND WATCHES. LEGO IS SMALL PLASTIC BRICKS THAT YOU MAKE HOUSES WITH AND EVEN CARS AND WAGONS ONE GIRL HAS THREE SINDYS CALLED HOLLY DOLLY AND POLLY. THEY ARE DOLLS AND HAVE EVERY THING JUST LIKE A REAL PERSON. STAR WARS FIGURES COME FROM A FILM CALLED STAR WARS ,THEY ARE LITTLE PLASTIC MEN AND SPACE MONSTERS.YOU CAN GET SPACE SHIPS FOR THE FIGURES. MANY OF TODAYS TOYS ARE ELECTRONICALLY CONTROLLED.
